commit message: Add option to show all spoilers
Improve cleanup of the search results
Removed legacy menu button (that was somehow showing up)
Add functionality for toggling spoiler visibility
Setting to show spoilers by hovering over them
Use android:versionCode instead of parsing android:versionName
Eliminated almost all strings from the source code
Move database functions to a different package
Increment version to 1.1.3, disable update check
